full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 197 of 228 873 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct 1 Q. Okay. Whenever you saw whatever books you saw in the 2000s, they didn't have Post-It notes on them; correct? 2 A. Correct. 3 Q. Okay. When you looked through Exhibit 52 last night, 19 4 years after you left Mr. Epstein's employment, did you notice 5 that there was handwriting in Exhibit 52. 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. That's not your handwriting; correct? 8 A. No. 9 Q. And there were dates in Exhibit 52 that were handwritten 10 not by you; correct? 11 A. Absolutely. 12 Q. And you can't recognize the handwriting that's contained in 13 Exhibit 52; correct? 14 A. Correct. 15 Q. There were parts of Exhibit 52 that were circled or there 16 were boxes put around different things; correct? 17 A. Correct. 18 Q. You didn't put those boxes or circles around anything; 19 correct? 20 A. Correct. 21 Q. And you don't know who, if anybody, put those boxes or 22 circles around the things in Exhibit 52; correct? 23 A. Correct. 24 Q. Now, you testified that from your observation and memory, 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018070
